about_the_game:
Background Story
"Three Kingdoms Punk" is the third game from Sunny Game, and we aim to offer a unique role-playing experience to everyone.
We've packed the entire Three Kingdoms world into a cyber city where East meets West, and poverty coexists with wealth -- HanKong City (a play on Hong Kong).
The traditional Eastern Han regime from the Three Kingdoms is reimagined as a super villain group ruling the entire city -- D.H.C (Dong Han Corporation, East Han Group).
The three powers of Wei, Shu, and Wu are transformed into factions of Heaven, Man, and Earth, seemingly in harmony with D.H.C but actually in conflict, controlling various resources of the city.
The Yellow Turban group, often portrayed as villains in most Three Kingdoms games, becomes the protagonist team in this game -- GOLD (a pun on 'Yellow Turban').
Players must lead the GOLD team, ostensibly running the Gold Bar, but secretly undertaking various commissions. In this cyber Three Kingdoms city, they must carve out a path of blood to realize their dreams of love and destruction.

About Gameplay
The game progresses in turns, each with limited action points.
Players invest in character development, equipment research, work dispatch, companion training, and commission execution.
There are 13 characters with different personalities and genders to develop and achieve companion endings with.
The main storyline leads to four major directions based on the player's relationship with the Heaven, Earth, and Man factions.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2G Hz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 4G Hz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Cyber Three Kingdoms Turn-Based Strategy RPG— As the latest humanoid AI developed, you were kidnapped by Zhang Jiao and joined the resistance organization—GOLD. Develop yourself, accept commissions, research prosthetics, cultivate companions and pursue the love and destruction in your heart!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
